column99: Ready to hack the system and crack the code to boost Klar‚Äôs organic visibility in Sweden? üïµÔ∏è‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è As our SEO Hacker, you will be¬† diving deep into the digital landscape, analyzing data and tweaking the algorithm  to unlock more organic traffic to our Swedish site. You will be the one behind the scenes, executing the strategy set from our Director of Organic¬† Nikolaj  and finding exploits to make Klar‚Äôs site rise to the top of search results. If you are¬† passionate about analyzing websites , cracking content codes, and tuning our pages to perfection, this is your digital playground! üöÄ üñ•Ô∏è Your main mission will be to hack the SEO system for Klar‚Äôs Swedish site.¬† From optimizing on-page content to performing technical fixes, you will work hands-on to improve performance and ensure we stay ahead of the competition.¬† You will constantly evaluate, optimize, and test content ‚Äî if you enjoy working with text and figuring out what makes the algorithm tick, you will thrive in this role. The digital world is constantly evolving, and as an SEO Specialist, you will uncover new ways to enhance Klar‚Äôs organic presence and outsmart the competition with innovative strategies. üîç‚ö° So if you are a SEO Specialist ready to crack the code and boost performance, we would love to hear from you! üîë Key Responsibilities: Day-to-day SEO actions and innovation in collaboration with the Director of Organic Data & Performance analysis in primarily Ahrefs, Accuranker and Screaming frog Choosing the right tasks that drives business instead - like optimizing business critical keywords, expanding EEAT initiatives, improving user experience Ad-hoc keyword research and content gaps Competitor and market research Create content briefs for long-format content Hands-on content tasks; will be part of day-to-day Technical SEO hygiene Sustainable backlink strategy planning and implementation ¬† üèÖ Qualifications: Fluent in Swedish üá∏üá™ - both spoken and written 3-4 years experience with SEO Proven track record of increasing organic visibility Proficiency in SEO tools like Ahrefs, Accuranker, Screaming frog We expect you to have the appropriate experience and to be self-motivated in managing daily tasks. On the ‚Äúnice-to-list‚Äù: Experience with E-com SEO and/or UX ¬† üëèüèª We offer: Biannual trips to Estonia. Think smoke sauna, pine forests, cheap craft beer üçª 5 weeks of vacation üèù 1 Care Day each quarter - a day JUST for you where you can do whatever you would like to üíô A one time extra 5 weeks paid sabbatical after 5 years of employment in the Company - meaning 5 weeks ON TOP of your already earned vacation üëè Pension - partly paid for by Klar üí∞ Health Insurance with dental coverage ü¶∑ Central location in N√∏rrebro 2 minutes of walk from Skjolds Plads üöÇ An opportunity to have a significant influence on your work and the business in general (we are very open to change) üí° Delicious and varied lunch buffet (vegan/non vegan) - partly paid for by Klar ü•ô An informal and positive workspace that likes to joke around ü§™ A scale-up environment: Not a start-up with no means, nor a corporate monster that doesn‚Äôt care üöÄ Unforgettable team events and company parties twice a year (all Klar heroes together ü¶∏üèºü•Çü¶∏‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è )¬† ¬† When are you "Klar"? ASAP  would be nice. But we are also realistic - so we are waiting for the right candidate üèÉ‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è At Klar, we're not just opening doors; we're opening opportunities. Join us today, and let's make windows and doors more exciting than ever before! üìçThe office location: Klar is a Scandinavian organization with offices in Denmark and Estonia. Our headquarters and factory are located in Estonia, Tartu - but you will be working with our vibrant team in our¬† Copenhagen-based office located in N√∏rrebro - Schiller House. Here you will join and get 16 cool, talented, and totally awesome colleagues - we look forward to meeting you! Our Copenhagen-based office is well connected to several public transportation points (bus and s-train stations within 2 min walk) and has access to a large parking lot (if you are not a big fan of cycling üö¥ ).
